channel.title: Custom Paint on John Cosio
channel.description: Recent content in Custom Paint on John Cosio

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju
item.description: Model Kit: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju Trying something different with the layouts. Also playing around with changing the Gundam’s color with this one. Before After A quick edit with colors. Changing from red to blue and the guns near the eyes. More practice with glowing things like the gun scopes and eye. Sometime in the future I would like to paint this.

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju
item.description: Model Kit: SD Gundam EX-Standard Sinanju Trying something different with the layouts. Also playing around with changing the Gundam’s color with this one. Before After A quick edit with colors. Changing from red to blue and the guns near the eyes. More practice with glowing things like the gun scopes and eye. Sometime in the future I would like to paint this.

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam Cross Silhouette Crossbone Gundam X1
item.description: Model Kit: SD Gundam Cross Silhouette Crossbone Gundam X1 Hello, here we are again with another GIMP Complete. I finished over during the holidays. Had some problems using my Mother’s laptop. It was just shutting down without warning. Can’t blame the laptop since it’s really old. Stopped running Windows XP and had to reformat with Linux. LXLE made it usable again but that’s a story for another time. Setting up I need to get some base to pose the Gundam in the air.

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Gundam Deathscythe-Hell EW
item.description: This is my first take on painting with GIMP. Subject is the Gundam Deathscythe-Hell EW version. Practicing adding glowing things to eyes and the scythe. Before After I got some more posts coming up. Cleaning up the Gundam Crossbones and working on the SD Sinanju. Still 2 more SD then moving on to my MG kit or get some HG for practice. This is actually quite relaxing. Haven’t opened Steam in a while.

item.title: GIMP Complete: SD Gundam EX-Standard Wing Gundam Zero EW
item.description:
So after looking around on how to paint and what best way to do this I ended up coloring and working on this using my computer. This is the previous SD we built – Wing Gundam EW Before editing using GIMP Before editing After editing Cleaned up some nubs, changes colors and a lot more easier done.
Pros of using computer Cheaper I didn’t have to buy any paint Faster, it is seen asap.
